document_data.name: Hobart Hoppalong
document_data.mainbody: '''Hobart Hoppalong''' was a mortal who achieved apotheosis in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], becoming a [[quasi-deity]] protector of children and patron of humor, pranks, and insanity.
document_data.Possessions: Hobart Hoppalong was surrounded by an aura of [[wild magic]] caused by the ''[[amulet of anarchy]]'' that he wore around his neck. The amulet contained pieces of both [[Limbo]] and [[Pandemonium]] within. The ''wild magic'' extended {{SI|600|yard|long=yes}} in all directions with Hobart being in the "eye of the storm", allowing his own spells to function normally.{{Cite organized play/LC/Fool's Luck|5}}
